thread.title: Tech Start-Up, ConsulTeams, Launches New Platform to Connect Consultants and Businesses
thread.title_full: Tech Start-Up, ConsulTeams, Launches New Platform to Connect Consultants and Businesses

author: admin
title: Tech Start-Up, ConsulTeams, Launches New Platform to Connect Consultants and Businesses
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/23/2015 @ 10:50 AM   ConsulTeams 
FISHERS, Ind. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- ConsulTeams, a new software-as-a-service (SaaS) company, announced the launch of their consulting platform today. Consulteams.com allows business owners and entrepreneurs to find and engage industry experts quickly, easily, and affordably. 
This first of its kind platform allows consultants the ability to provide and capitalize on services for short durations as well as develop long-term relationships, while tracking all interactions from start to finish. 
ConsulTeams Co-founder and CEO Haresh Gangwani stated, “The ConsulTeams Platform is a huge leap forward in our mission of making micro-engagements easily accessible and a frictionless process for businesses seeking expert advice.” 
For businesses, the Consulteams.com portal helps to: Find qualified experts, advisers, and coaches quick and easy. Arrange and manage online meetings. Build a virtual team of your favorite consultants. 
For consultants, the underlying CTX platform provides the ability to: Acquire new clients through Consulteams.com. Negotiate rates with easy meeting proposals. Schedule meetings both online and in-person. Meet via secure video or audio conferencing or track offline sessions. Track all meetings and communications that occur for engagements. Get Paid by ACH after an online invoice has been submitted and approved . 
Mike Deweese, Food and Beverage Consultant and Entrepreneur, stated, “ConsulTeams is a groundbreaking idea for both experts and potential clients. As an expert, I am provided with a seamless platform to schedule meetings, create proposals and collect fees. For clients, it provides the ease of not having to engage in a long-term agreement which may make getting help cost-prohibitive.” 
For more information about ConsulTeams, visit Consulteams.com. To learn more about the platform launch, platform, or to schedule an interview, contact Morgan Cooper at 765-566-7200 or email, morgan.cooper@consulteams.com . 
About ConsulTeams 
Headquartered in Fishers, Indiana and founded in 2015, ConsulTeams is a Software as a Service (SaaS) company where entrepreneurs and business leaders can find and engage marketing, sales, technology, finance, and other relevant experts and thought leaders quickly, easily, and affordably. The CTX software provides a robust micro-engagement and marketing fulfillment platform for a multitude of consultants. Learn more about ConsulTeams by visiting Consulteams.com , and connecting with them on Twitter , and LinkedIn .
